title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node or browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package allowing Ollama models as LLM backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama, supports multi-model chats and document import.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with chat history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code suggestions via Ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot template that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings and LangChain.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm registry page for the official Ollama JavaScript client.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: PyPI landing page for the official Python client library.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset enabling Ollama models in pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with thread support and model switching.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, completion, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete and summarization via Ollama.
